name: Peony 3 Yard Bundle
description:
Introducing Peony - a perfectly romantic and sweetly blushing pink.

This hand dyed ribbon has delicate variations of soft, pale pink with hints of white. The crinkled fabric adds to the vintage appearance giving it a unique look to your crafty projects, gifts, or handmade creations. 

You will receive one bundle of 3 generous yards of hand-dyed crinkle ribbon (more if you iron out flat). Each bundle measure ½ inch wide and is made of 100% Rayon. 

Each bundle comes wrapped in a vintage book page, tied with twine, and dressed with a button. 

I take great pride in packaging your purchases with care and will have your item shipped to you quickly.
